summary.span: 表示 的行的集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of rows for a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的主要组成部分。The is a major component of the . 虽然定义的表的架构包含的实际数据的表，其中每个中表示单个行。While the defines the schema of the table, the contains the actual data for the table, where each in the represents a single row. 您可以调用并方法来插入和删除对象从。You can call the and methods to insert and delete objects from the . 您还可以调用方法搜索包含主键列中的特定值的对象和方法搜索字符基于数据的单个词或短语。You can also call the method to search for objects that contain specific values in primary key columns, and the method to search character-based data for single words or phrases. 对于其他操作，如排序或筛选，使用方法关联的。For other operations, such as sorting or filtering the , use methods on the ’s associated . ## Examples 本部分中的第一个示例将打印第 1 列的每一行中的值。The first example in this section prints the value of column 1 for every row in a . 第二个示例将使用创建的新行添加方法。The second example adds a new row created by using the method to the . [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataRowCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataRowCollection Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataRowCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataRowCollection Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 将指定的 添加到 对象中。

span.span: Adds the specified to the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要创建一个新，则必须使用方法的类。To create a new , you must use the method of the class. 当你使用方法时，新将返回的对象使用的父架构。When you use the method, a new object is returned using the schema of parent . 在创建后对象和设置的每个其列的值，请使用方法将该对象添加到集合。After you create the object and set the values for each of its columns, use the method to add the object to the collection. 如果用户将在引发异常，则会生成异常事件。Generates an exception if the user generates an exception in the event. 如果发生异常，行是不会添加到表中。If an exception occurs, the row is not added to the table. ## Examples 下面的示例使用方法将添加一个新到对象。The following example uses the method to add a new to a object. remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要使用方法，到对象对象属于必须至少一个列作为主键列被指定。To use the method, the object to which the object belongs to must have at least one column designated as a primary key column. 请参阅属性以获取有关如何创建主键列的详细信息。See the property for more information about how to create a primary key column. 一旦已确定了行中包含指定的值，可以使用方法以返回特定于具有值的对象。As soon as you have determined that a row contains the specified value, you can use the method to return the specific object that has the value. ## Examples 下面的 Visual Basic 示例使用方法，以确定是否对象包含特定值。The following Visual Basic example uses the method to determine whether a object contains a specific value. remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要使用`Find`方法，到对象对象所属必须至少一个列作为主键列被指定。To use the `Find` method, the object to which the object belongs must have at least one column designated as a primary key column. 请参阅属性以获取有关如何创建主键列的详细信息。See the property for more information about how to create a primary key column. ## Examples 下面的示例使用方法来查找主键值"2"集合中的对象。The following example uses the method to find the primary key value "2" in a collection of objects. 该方法将返回特定于对象允许您更改它的值，根据需要。The method returns the specific object letting you change its values, as needed. remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要使用方法，到对象对象所属必须至少一个列作为主键列被指定。To use the method, the object to which the object belongs must have at least one column designated as a primary key column. 当两个或多个行具有相同的主键值时，则返回找到的第一行。When two or more rows have the same primary key value, then the first row found is returned. 发生这种情况时设置为 false。This occurs when is set to false. 请参阅属性以获取有关如何创建的详细信息列中或数组对象时表具有多个主键。See the property for more information about how to create a column, or an array of objects when the table has more than one primary key. ## Examples 下面的示例使用数组的值的集合中查找特定行对象。The following example uses the values of an array to find a specific row in a collection of objects. 该方法假定存在具有三个主键列。The method assumes that a exists with three primary key columns. 在创建后的值的数组，该代码使用方法要获取所需的特定对象的数组。After creating an array of the values, the code uses the method with the array to get the particular object that you want. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataRowCollection.Find1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataRowCollection.Find1 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataRowCollection.Find1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataRowCollection.Find1 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定的位置中的行的顺序反映仅。The location specified by is reflected by the order of rows in the only. 如果多个行中返回数组中，插入的行可能不会返回在指定的位置中。If more than one row is returned in a array, the inserted row may not be returned in the location specified by . 例如，属性返回的行中指定的插入位置。For example, the property returns the row in the specified insert position. 和不可能。 and may not. 当你编写的内容作为 XML 使用，例如， ，根据指定的顺序写入行。When you write the contents of the as XML, for example, , the rows are written according to the order specified by the . 如果指定的值`pos`参数大于集合中的行数，新行添加到末尾。If the value specified for the `pos` parameter is greater than the number of rows in the collection, the new row is added to the end.

summary.span: 从集合中移除指定的 。

span.span: Removes the specified from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 时，删除的行，该行中的所有数据都都会丢失。When a row is removed, all data in that row is lost. 您还可以调用方法的类只是将标记为删除的行。You can also call the method of the class to just mark a row for removal. 调用`Remove`等同于调用，然后再调用。Calling `Remove` is the same as calling and then calling . 不应调用在 foreach 循环中循环访问时对象。 should not be called in a foreach loop while iterating through a object. 修改集合的状态。 modifies the state of the collection. 此外可以使用方法移除集合中一次的所有成员。You can also use the method to remove all members of the collection at one time. ## Examples 下面的示例使用方法来删除中的找到的行对象。The following example uses the method to delete a found row in a object. 该示例首先使用方法，以确定行集合是否包含一行。The example first uses the method to determine whether the rows collection contains a row. 如果是这样，方法用于查找的特定行和方法然后用于删除的行。If it does, the method is used to find the specific row, and the method is then used to remove the row. [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataRowCollection.Remove Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataRowCollection.Remove Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
